en.historyview_getting_started_highlight: To get started, try highlighting the following block of text, and pressing {shortcut}
en.historyview_getting_started_copy: To get started, try copying the following block of text, and pressing {shortcut}
en.settingview_clipboard_mode_desc: Determines where text is pulled from for parsing
en.settingview_clipboard_mode_auto: Replace highlighted text, bypassing the clipboard
en.settingview_silent_errors_desc: Suppresses the popup message on parsing errors
en.settingview_silent_errors_on: Log errors, but do not display them
en.settingview_autostart_desc: Opens {name} automatically when logging in to your computer
en.settingview_theme_desc: Visual style for the settings window
en.settingview_keyboard_shortcut_desc: The shortcut that parses the clipboard contents
en.settingview_extension_dir_desc: Imported extensions will be copied to this directory
en.helpview_help_1: In Windows, by default the keyboard shortcut {shortcut} will interpret any currently highlighted text as an expression, parse that expression, and replace it with the resulting value.
en.helpview_help_2: On other platforms, or when the clipboard mode has been changed, then instead of using highlighted text, {name} will use the contents of the clipboard.
